viralPosts.text:
You can make an element look like something it's not, but under the hood it's still NOT that thing you made it look like.

Making <details> & <summary> look like tabs doesn't make them tabs. css-tricks.com/pure-css-tab... ‚Äî tabs have specific semantic and behavior requirements. #a11y
viralPosts.author: sarasoueidan.com

viralPosts.text:
Ugh. "content within a `<details>` element with `display: contents` is not accessible when expanded." bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi... ‚Äî sadly unsurprising for Safari considering all the history that Adrian documents in his post. 

#a11y
viralPosts.author: sarasoueidan.com

viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: brassclothes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Keep being loud, it works!!! 
#Disabilitysky #CripTheVote

viralPosts.author: byrneout44.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Disability justice is economic justice. In 2023, 24.2% of disabled adults 18‚Äì64 lived in poverty vs 9.9% of nondisabled peers. That gap isn‚Äôt grit; it‚Äôs policy, access, bias. Enforce ADA, end subminimum wage, raise SSI asset limits, and fund real access. #DisabilityJustice #TruthBombTuesday
viralPosts.author: mrskgrady.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Many seem to think #disabled people "should just work", but they don't understand/care that:

1. Workplaces systemically discriminate against us 

2. We're often paid less than the non-disabled

3. Accommodations that would enable us to work are often denied

and it makes me mad.
#DisabilityJustice
viralPosts.author: ellatholmes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
He didn‚Äôt hurt anyone‚Äîhe just loved trains.
Darius McCollum, an autistic man, spent decades in jail for following his passion instead of being offered support or a job. The system punished difference instead of understanding it.
#AutismAwareness #DisabilityJustice #Inclusion #Pink #Momsky
